name: Turncoat Protocol
description:
As the sole mortally wounded survivor on a scouting mission to the hostile's homeworld you have been placed in a virtual simulation. Your goal is to piece your own memories together into viable strategies that can be used against the adversaries before you die. As you delve deeper into your memories it gets harder to keep up the link to the simulation but you must prevail to keep your superiors satisfied with your performance.

A more polished version of What Have I Become? A game made for Ludum Dare 33 with the theme "You are the monster"

#LDJAM #LD33 #LudumDare #2d #cyperpunk #scifi #story #puzzle #horror
developers: Alexander Birke aka Out Of Bounds Games
